structure.unit: ARTICLE L. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY HISPANIC AFFAIRS ADVISORY BOARD

text.section:
Sec. 2-532. Composition; terms.
The Miami-Dade County Hispanic Affairs Advisory Board shall be composed of twenty-seven (27) members who shall be permanent residents and electors of the county and who shall have a knowledge of and interest in the county's Hispanic community. Each county commissioner shall appoint three (3) members of the Board: one member for an initial one-year term, one member for an initial two-year term, and one member for an initial three-year term. Appointments after the initial term shall be for a term of three (3) years.
